Class Shunting

  • public class Shunting
extends ARpn
    Author:
    ankirama Class to convert infix to shunting yard format (42 + 3 -> 42 3 +)

      private boolean compareAssio(java.lang.String token1, java.lang.String token2)
      Function to check wich token has greater precedence (only same assiociative) if > 0 then just add in stack (for example token1 = *, token2 = + -> res > 0)

      • convertCurrentToken

        public void convertCurrentToken(java.lang.String token)
        Called for each token like 4 + 2 it will check the current token and will do the shunting-yard algo (used to convert infix -> RPN)
        Parameters:

      • compareAssio

        private boolean compareAssio(java.lang.String token1,
                   java.lang.String token2)
        Function to check wich token has greater precedence (only same assiociative) if > 0 then just add in stack (for example token1 = *, token2 = + -> res > 0)
        Parameters:
        token1 - could be + - ...
        token2 - could be + - ...
        Returns:
        boolean about our compare function
